title: Add intro config parsing to server.js
Cracker Intro Homepage
description:
Replace the current home page with an Apple II warez-style boot menu featuring:

- Configurable boot sequence with CRT monitor effect
- Randomized ASCII art banner (block or figlet style)

```html
<meta property="og:description" content="Classic Apple II games faithfully recreated for the modern web">

```

title: Sanitize user-configurable marquee text
description:
The INTRO_MARQUEE_TEXT environment variable is rendered directly in the EJS template without escaping at views/index.ejs:404. While EJS escapes by default with <%= %>, this could still be a concern if the template is modified to use <%- %> or if special characters cause display issues.

Recommendation: Add explicit validation in server.js to strip/escape HTML entities from the marquee text before passing to template.

title: Remove beads runtime files from git tracking
description:
Runtime files (.beads/daemon.*, .beads/*.db-*, .beads/.local_version, .beads/metadata.json) were accidentally committed. These should be in .gitignore and removed from tracking. Only .beads/issues.jsonl should be tracked.

Files to remove from git:
- .beads/.local_version
- .beads/beads.db-shm
- .beads/beads.db-wal
- .beads/daemon.lock
- .beads/daemon.pid
- .beads/metadata.json

Add to .gitignore:
- .beads/*
- !.beads/issues.jsonl

title: Test all intro configuration options
description:
Manual testing of all INTRO_* configuration combinations.

Test cases:
1. Boot disabled (INTRO_BOOT_ENABLED=false)
2. Marquee disabled (INTRO_MARQUEE_ENABLED=false)
3. Custom marquee text
4. Greets disabled (INTRO_GREETS_ENABLED=false)
5. Custom greets list
6. Audio enabled (INTRO_AUDIO_ENABLED=true)
7. Forced banner style (block/figlet)
8. Reset .env to defaults

Each test requires server restart and visual verification.
